name: latasymb
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)))

stmt.origin: syl3an1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cpo))
stmt.pretty: syl3an1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ((c1[c4]c3 ∧ c3[c4]c1)↔ c1 = c3), c0 ∈ Poset)
